Name: [Artifice] Magician Gloves
Desc:
For {CReplaceCardParam:ProgressLeft,1,2} combats, Chain Attacks replenish <color=#CF4029>1</color> less Assist Point.
Once reconstructed, Defensive Assist inflicts <color=#2BAD00>60%</color> more Daze, and Assist Follow-Up DMG increases by <color=#2BAD00>100%</color>.
Desc2: If you don't want to play the role of the embarrassed fool in a show, then don't shake the hand of a gloved magician.
